Miscellaneous Highlights: The Milwaukee Brewers are knocking in 4.8 runs per game, which puts them at 9th in MLB.
The Cincinnati Reds have hit 154 home runs so far this year as well as 563 runs batted in.
The Reds have a team SLG% of.399 and they are earning 4.47 runs per game (15th in the league).
Others: The expected starting pitchers are Frankie Montas and Carson Spiers.
The Milwaukee Brewers have earned 3,515 putouts thus far, as well as 1,114 assists and 68 errors.
The Reds have recorded 1,008 assists, 85 errors and are sitting with 3,513 putouts on the season.
